enableJavaScript: JavaScript is required for the full functionality of this page. Please enable JavaScript in your browser settings.

home.description: Voting Made Simple, Secure, and Empowering
home.subheader: Voting Made Simple, Secure, and Empowering
home.webAppCardDescription: Seamless web-based voting experience, accessible and user-friendly.
home.telegramBotCardDescription: Convenient voting through Telegram, integrating voting into daily communication.
home.weightedScoreDescription: Empowering voters to express their preferences with precision, allowing negative votes to carry more weight than positive ones.
home.effortlessSharingDescription: Seamlessly share voting links with anyone, enabling widespread participation and engagement.
home.consensusDrivenDescription: Collect diverse proposals from participants, fostering a collaborative decision-making process.
home.userFriendlyDescription: Intuitive and easy-to-navigate platform, ensuring easy accessibility on all devices.
home.transparentResultsDescription: After the voting phase ends, all votes are transparently displayed, promoting trust in the process.

dashboard.noProcesses: Currently, there are no processes to display.
dashboard.beginProcess: Begin by creating a new process or adding an existing one to get started.
dashboard.options: What would you like to do?

guide.checkboxLabel: Do not show this guide next time

setup.existingProcessPrompt: You have an existing process. Would you like to continue?
setup.timeLeftHeading: Select the time for proposals and voting
setup.errorMinProposals: You need at least 2 proposals to proceed.
setup.errorNotEnoughValidProposals: You need at least 2 non-empty proposals to proceed.
setup.errorSelectTime: Please select valid times for all phases.

error.proposalsMissing: Missing proposals, you need at least 2 proposals
error.missingProposals: Missing proposals, you need to select at least 2 proposals
error.payloadSizeTooLarge: Payload size is too large, please reduce the size of your content

zero.title: Status quo
zero.description: Keep things the way they are.

one.title: Repeat process
one.description: Repeat the process and look for other options.

description: Ukuvota is a powerful decision making tool that helps people make informed choices in a collaborative and organized manner.
